resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82116</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82116</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>6332</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Electricity and Magnetism Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario sobre electricidad y magnetismo</string>
            <string language="ga">Leictreachas agus Maighnéadachas – Tráth na gCeist</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrizität und Magnetismus-Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu de l'électricité et de magnétisme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz da eletricidade e do magnetismo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz di magnetismo e di elettricità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγωνισμός γνώσεων ηλεκτρικής ενέργειας και 
μαγνητισμού</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will test their knowledge of electricity and magnetism. Solutions are given to questions so students will be able to improve their knowledge of the material.</string>
            <string language="es">Los estudiantes comprobarán sus conocimientos sobre electricidad y magnetismo. Se ofrecen soluciones a las preguntas de forma que los estudiantes podrán mejorar sus conocimientos de los materiales.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tástálfaidh daltaí a n-eolas ar leictreachas agus maighnéadachas. Tugtar freagrai ar na ceisteanna chun go mneidh na daltaí ábalta a n-eolas a fheabhsú</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencias</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer prüfen ihr Wissen von 
Elektrizität und von Magnetismus. Lösungen werden zu den 
Fragen gegeben, also können Kursteilnehmer, ihr Wissen des Materials 
zu verbessern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants testeront leur connaissance de 
l'électricité et de magnétisme. Des solutions sont données 
aux questions ainsi les étudiants pourront améliorer leur 
connaissance du matériel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes testarão seu conhecimento da 
eletricidade e do magnetismo. As soluções são dadas às 
perguntas assim que os estudantes poderão  melhorar seu conhecimento 
do material.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi verificheranno la loro conoscenza di 
elettricità e di magnetismo. Le soluzioni sono date alle 
domande in modo da gli allievi potranno migliorare la loro conoscenza 
del materiale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα εξετάσουν τη γνώση τους ηλεκτρικής 
ενέργειας και μαγνητισμού. Οι λύσεις δίνονται στις 
ερωτήσεις έτσι οι σπουδαστές θα είναι σε θέση να βελτιώσουν τη 
γνώση τους του υλικού.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>

            <entry>6332</entry>

          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
